metadata.title: CVE-2021-47144 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/amdgpu: fix refcount leak [Why] the gem object rfb->base.obj[0] isget according to num_planes in amdgpufb_create, but is not put according tonum_planes [How] put rfb->base.obj[0] in amdgpu_fbdev_destroy according tonum_planes

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47144` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-80-generic - 5.4.0-80.90~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-80-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-80.90~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-80-lowlatency - 5.4.0-80.90~18.04.1

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-80-lowlatency - 5.4.0-80.90~18.04.1
No subscription required
